item.title: If code is poetry, then documentation is prose
item.description:
What is poetry?

Before starting, let’s agree on some terminology. Obviously poetry is a literary form, a way to write down things I would say, but how do you recognize it, how can you say that is poetry and this is not? Well, according to my literary heritage (I’m italian) something is poetry when it has verse, rhyme and stanza; let’s see what they are and how we can recognize them.
